translations: 拼接；[生化]剪接；剪接作用；驳布位
拼接；使结合（splice 的 ing 形式）；绞接

sentences.sentence: Cleantech entrepreneurs are splicing genes in the search for greener fuels.
sentences.translation: 清洁技术企业家在为绿色燃料搜索剪接基因。

sentences.sentence: Bind mounts facilitate splicing any file or directory on top of any other.
sentences.translation: 绑定挂载可以将任何文件或目录放在任何其他目录上。

sentences.sentence: But Blake cuts it short 30 seconds in by splicing and resampling the piano line.
sentences.translation: 但Blake通过拼接和再次采样钢琴声(piano line)把它减短了30秒。
